night.h File Reference

a class to use as a ReducedImage, to avoid reopening the FitsImage This is basically the same as a ReducedImage. However, if you need to use often most of the parameters of the ReducedImage, the Night class will be faster since it does not do any query on the FITS file. This one is used mostly to build lightcurves. More...

Detailed Description

a class to use as a ReducedImage, to avoid reopening the FitsImage This is basically the same as a ReducedImage. However, if you need to use often most of the parameters of the ReducedImage, the Night class will be faster since it does not do any query on the FITS file. This one is used mostly to build lightcurves.
